timeline.bodyText: Question: you fetch the next token above in line 131, and then here the subtoken. So this moves the stream forward twice, right? What happens if the user adds an empty brace, i.e []. Is the closing bracket still found? Can you please add a test for this case as well. Thanks!
timeline.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText: Good catch! But what should "[]" expand to? Inside a quote, the parsing should work fine. but what does "[]" mean in terms of JabRef fields? Should it just do nothing and print an appropriate warning?
replies.author: btut

replies.bodyText: Yes, I would say it should do nothing and log a warning. I don't really see a use case for the empty bracket, it should just not break the parser.
replies.author: tobiasdiez
